item.description:

item.description: Explore industry moves and significant changes in the industry for the week of March 10, 2025. Stay updated with the latest industry trends and shifts.

item.title: ClickFix Widely Adopted by Cybercriminals, APT Groups
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
The ClickFix technique has been employed by cybercrime and APT groups for information stealer and other malware deployment.

The post ClickFix Widely Adopted by Cybercriminals, APT Groups appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: LockBit Ransomware Developer Extradited to US
item.dc:creator: Eduard Kovacs
item.description:
Russian-Israeli LockBit ransomware developer Rostislav Panev has been extradited from Israel to the United States.

The post LockBit Ransomware Developer Extradited to US appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: New AI Security Tool Helps Organizations Set Trust Zones for Gen-AI Models
item.dc:creator: Kevin Townsend
item.description:
Measure the different level of risk inherent to all gen-AI foundational models and use that to fine-tune the operation of in-house AI deployments.

The post New AI Security Tool Helps Organizations Set Trust Zones for Gen-AI Models appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.description:

item.title: New CCA Jailbreak Method Works Against Most AI Models
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
Two Microsoft researchers have devised a new jailbreak method that bypasses the safety mechanisms of most AI systems.

The post New CCA Jailbreak Method Works Against Most AI Models appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Recent Fortinet Vulnerabilities Exploited in ‘SuperBlack’ Ransomware Attacks
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
The newly discovered SuperBlack ransomware has been exploiting two vulnerabilities in Fortinet firewalls.

The post Recent Fortinet Vulnerabilities Exploited in ‘SuperBlack’ Ransomware Attacks appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Unpatched Edimax Camera Flaw Exploited Since at Least May 2024
item.dc:creator: Eduard Kovacs
item.description:
A recently disclosed Edimax zero-day vulnerability has been exploited in the wild by Mirai botnets for nearly a year.

The post Unpatched Edimax Camera Flaw Exploited Since at Least May 2024 appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Cisco Patches 10 Vulnerabilities in IOS XR
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
Cisco has released patches for 10 vulnerabilities in IOS XR, including five denial-of-service (DoS) bugs.

The post Cisco Patches 10 Vulnerabilities in IOS XR appeared first on SecurityWeek.
